scripts.start: pm2 start ts-node --name metagraph-monitoring -- -r tsconfig-paths/register src/index.ts
scripts.dev: pm2 start ts-node --name metagraph-monitoring-dev -- -r tsconfig-paths/register src/index.ts --dev_mode && pm2 logs metagraph-monitoring-dev
scripts.force-restart: pm2 start ts-node --name metagraph-monitoring -- -r tsconfig-paths/register src/index.ts --force_restart
scripts.force-restart-dev: pm2 start ts-node --name metagraph-monitoring-dev -- -r tsconfig-paths/register src/index.ts --dev_mode --force_restart && pm2 logs metagraph-monitoring-dev
